title: whiveprotocol
author: whiveprotocol
created_time: April 08, 2023, 06:50:09 AMLast edit: July 24, 2023, 06:19:42 AM by whiveprotocol
content: 🚀🌐🔥 Welcome to the Whive Protocol! 🔥🌐🚀The Whive Protocol fosters renewable energy adoption and a smart, distributed economy for IoT and AI applications. It presents a platform for micro-payments and rewards, allowing individuals in regions rich in sustainable energy resources to earn cryptocurrency while contributing to green energy initiatives.Nyukia Trivia Game showcases the potential of the Whive Protocol to reward users with $WHIVE coins based on their skills and knowledge.Nyukia Trivia Game: http://nyukia.aiNyukia Website: https://nyukia.com/Nyukia Twitter: https://twitter.com/nyukiaverseTaproot UpgradeWhive Protocol announces its upcoming Taproot upgrade, introducing more efficient, affordable smart contracts and reduced transaction costs. The updated source code is available on Github, with binaries for Mac OS, Linux, and Windows. The expected Taproot activation date is July 11, 2023.🌐 Key Features:[] Fast and secure transactions powered by the Yespower Whive consensus algorithm[] Decentralized and permissionless network for global adoption[] Low transaction fees and energy-efficient CPU mining[] Emphasis on sustainable distributed computing with a CPU-friendly mining algorithm🔥 Why Whive?Whive Protocol, featuring a fair-mined launch, no premine or ICO, and wide distribution across numerous countries, is a community-driven project prioritizing energy-efficient CPU mining. GPU and ASIC-resistant, Whive Protocol ensures fast, secure transactions, fostering a more equitable future for global renewable energy markets.🌐 Learn More:Website: https://whive.ioResources: https://whiveio.gitbook.io/the-whive-protocol/CoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/the-whive-protocol/Mining Pool: http://whivepool.cointest.comGreenpaper: http://greenpaper.whive.ioExplorer: http://explorer.cointest.comExplorer 2: http://explorer2.cointest.comCalculator: http://whivecalculator.cointest.comGitHub: https://github.com/WhiveioTelegram: https://t.me/WhiveioTwitter: https://twitter.com/WhiveioMedium: https://medium.com/@whiveioJoin the Whive community today! 🚀🌐🔥
